pis_title: All-Surface Stain & Sealer – Product Information Sheet (PIS)

titles.title: Defense, Waterproof, UV Resistant
titles.premium: Waterproof | Mold & Mildew Resistant | Multi-Surface Application
titles.title2: Ultimate multi-surface coating for all environments.

product_overview: Ultimate multi-surface coating for all environments.
short_description: The one coating every surface can trust — waterproof, UV-stable, breathable, and flexible.
positioning: Defense adapts to nearly any surface, offering long-lasting protection across all climates and use cases.

features_benefits.benefit: Applies to wood, metal, concrete, plaster, brick, tile, and masonry
Seals moisture out while allowing substrate breathability
Prevents fading, chalking, and sun damage
Adapts to surface expansion and contraction without peeling
Prevents microbial growth in humid or damp areas

recommended_use.intro: Ideal for protecting a variety of surfaces in diverse climates.

application_system.label: First Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply thin, even coat across surface

application_system.label: Second Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply after 4 hrs for maximum waterproof barrier

surface_preparation: Ensure substrate is free of rust, dust, and oil
application: Apply by spray, roller, or brush
Work during cooler hours (morning/evening) to prevent rapid drying

safety_first_aid.General: Use gloves and ensure ventilation during use

environmental_commitment: Water-based, low-VOC sealer designed for eco-friendly, long-lasting protection on all surfaces.

usage.application: All-in-one multi-surface stain and sealer for maximum protection

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply with spray, roller or brush. Use 2 coats for full waterproofing.
specs_summary.safety_precautions: No open flames nearby; use protective gloves
